scripts.dev2: concurrently "npm run bundle" "npm run manifest" "npm run readme"
scripts.manifest: nodemon --watch src\manifest.json --exec "npm run copy-manifest & npm run copy-manifest-windows"
scripts.readme: nodemon --watch .\readme.json --exec "npm run copy-readme & npm run copy-readme-windows"
scripts.copy-manifest: cp src/manifest.json dist/manifest.json && cp src/manifest.json release/manifest.json
scripts.copy-manifest-windows: copy src\manifest.json dist\manifest.json && copy src\manifest.json release\manifest.json
scripts.copy-images: cp src/images/logo.jpg dist/logo.jpg && cp src/images/logo.jpg release/logo.jpg
scripts.copy-images-windows: copy src\images\logo.jpg dist\logo.jpg && copy src\images\logo.jpg release\logo.jpg
scripts.package-asar: Del /F /Q ".\dist\package.asar" & npx asar pack dist tmp/package.asar && move "tmp\package.asar" "dist\package.asar"
scripts.build: esbuild ./src/index.tsx  --jsx-factory=jsx --inject:./src/react-shim.ts --format=esm --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js && npm run package-asar && npm run type-check
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run build-index-watch" "npm run type-check-watch" "npm run package-watch"
